programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: After Patrick eats life-threatening chum, SpongeBob helps him with his 'Chum Bucket List', then in 'Big Baby Patrick', Patrick devolves back into a baby so he can keep his childhood toys. (S2, ep 7)

programme.desc: Draculaura & Toralei are magically stuck together in 'Best Fiends', then in 'Scareer Day', Heath and his dad Hades must work together to save the school from a swarm of vicious pixies. (S1, ep 21)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Can't Hardly Date: As Sarah & Gideon's crushes on Max & Phoebe escalate, the twins set them up on a date with each other to solve the problem once and for all. (S4, ep 30)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Spin the Bottle: Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a live dinosaur in 'A Dinosaur in Dimmadelphia', then in 'Fearless', Hazel wishes that Jasmine was fearless. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Jeffy T's Prankwell Emporium: Squidward's prankster dad visits and brings all sorts of gags with him (much to Squidward's annoyance).

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Great Snack Off: Alvin and Theodore play a seemingly innocent game, which leads to unexpected consequences. (S5, ep 1b)

programme.desc: Unboxing Day: Alvin's attempts to make money as an internet influencer almost drives a local toy store out of business. (S5, ep 2a)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Dave's Pavilion: When the Chipmunks accidentally ruin Dave's new pavilion, they allow Miss Miller to take the fall. (S5, ep 2b)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: U-Fly: Alvin's too short to ride an exhilarating new amusement park ride, so he devises a plan to sneak on after hours. (S5, ep 3a)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Sandy gives her friends special saltwater trees in 'Arbor Day Disarray', then in 'Ain't That The Tooth', SpongeBob and Patrick mistake a burglar for the tooth fairy.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Are You Afraid of the Park?: Max and Phoebe start a fight between Billy and Nora so they can avoid riding a roller coaster, but it all backfires when things get out of control. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: It's King Neptune's birthday, and SpongeBob wants to make sure his friends and family are there, including his son, Triton. But Neptune and Triton don't get along...

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Great Patty Caper: SpongeBob, Patrick and Plankton solve a mystery on a runaway train.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show

programme.desc: The Upside Of Hunger: Owen has a mishap while baking an upside-down cake and is transported to an upside-down world where he is forced to outwit himself in order to get his cake back. (S2 Ep25)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Fire In The Hole: Duncan cooks up a nuclear hot sauce to mess with Chef, but accidentally summons Terry Spice, King of the Underworld! (S2 Ep26)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Tu Ba Or Not Tu Ba: The class tries to help Chef achieve his dream of joining the world's most famous Tuba Band, Tubalicious, only to regret it when they realise how much they'll miss him. (S2 Ep27)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dude Where's Macaw: While trying to defend his elite gamer status, Chef uses an old cheat code that brings a dangerous avatar to life. (S2 Ep28)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Way Back Wendel: Courtney must deliberately lose a challenge or let the entire world go back in time. It's a hard choice for her. (S2 Ep29)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Stingin' In The Rain: When Chef gets locked outside during a storm, the kids mistakenly assume he's a robber and decide to protect the Daycare - by any means necessary. (S2 Ep30)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cartoon Realism: Gwen is frustrated by Beth's silly belief that cartoons are real, but they visit an animation studio and discover that Beth is right! (S2 Ep31)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Oww: When the kids discover Chef's past as a disgraced pro wrestler, they invite his old tag team partner to help put on a charity show. But is the big match about reunion or revenge?! (S2 Ep32)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Animan: As Marinette waits for Adrien at the zoo, the zoo keeper gets akumatized into a panther by Hawk Moth. (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Darkblade: After losing the municipal election, D'Argencourt gets akumatized into 'Darkblade.' (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Miraculous:...
programme.desc: ...Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir. Pharoah: Hawk Moth turns young Egyptologist Jalil into Pharoah, a super-villain with the powers of the gods of Ancient Egypt. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Miraculous:...
programme.desc: ...Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir. Timebreaker: Alix's classmates unwittingly break a priceless watch that her father has just entrusted her with. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Eye of the Tiger: Newsflash: Jade Armor stole the Golden Dragon! L.J. is appalled. Who is the imposter making her look bad? (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Quiche it Goodbye: When an 'evil conglomerate' is threatening to take over Chef's favourite childhood restaurant, Owen rallies the kids to take them down. (S3 Ep25)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Ice Guys Finish Last: Chef brings a souvenir iceberg home from a trip to the South Pole and Duncan finds a prehistoric surprise inside. (S3 Ep26)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gwen Scary, Gwen Lost - Part 1: When Chef discovers his spooky Halloween pranks have never scared the kids, he's devastated, and agrees to hand over full control of his pranking to Gwen. (S3 Ep27)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gwen Scary, Gwen Lost - Part 2: Gwen's plan turns out far spookier than Chef ever hoped. (S3 Ep28)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Trousering Inferno: The Bad Guy Busters must reunite to save Izzy after Harold uncovers her previous identity and leads a super villain from her past right to her. (S3 Ep29)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Big Bangs Theory: Chef forgets the password for his computer, but knows it has something to do with one of the 99 previous explosions that took out the school. (S3 Ep30)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Mad Math: Taffy Road: After Courtney refuses to share her taffy winnings from a 'calculus for candy' competition, she's transported to a desolate future. (S3 Ep31)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Bearly Edible: After eating snacks meant for everyone and replacing them with disgusting low budget cookies from Barfvomita, Owen is full of guilt and tries to make things right. (S3 Ep32)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug
programme.desc: and Cat Noir: Optigami: What would happen if Shadow Moth created a fearsome supervillain while Marinette and Adrien couldn't transform into Ladybug and Cat Noir? (S4 Ep13)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug
programme.desc: and Cat Noir: Sentibubbler: Shadow Moth creates Sentibubbler, a fearsome Sentimonster that will only stop if Rena Rouge betrays Ladybug and Cat Noir! Will our heroes pass this trust test? (S4 Ep14)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Glaciator 2: Unable to declare her love to Adrien, Marinette turns to Cat Noir to help her rehearse. But their closeness is not to everyone's liking... (S4 Ep15)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug
programme.desc: and Cat Noir: Hack-San: What if Marinette had no choice but to leave Paris on the day when Shadow Moth decided to create a new supervillain? (S4 Ep16)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Rogue Beasticon: Since breaking away from the Crimson Lord, Xinyan hates humans. When he gets a Shard that brings out people's animal nature, he wants to make a Human Zoo. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Robo Teacher: When a substitute teacher fills in for Chef, Duncan thinks it's going to be the best day ever. He's wrong. (S2 Ep1)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Glove Glove Me Do: Owen's newly found gloves make him great at everything. But this greatness comes at a high price. (S2 Ep2)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Tooth About Zombies: Gwen's favourite event, the Zombie March, falls on the same day as Beth's nightmare event, dental check-up day. The two girls find a way to help each other out. (S2 Ep3)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Lie-ranosaurus Wrecked: Owen pretends to be Izzy's pet dinosaur after leading her to believe she dug him up in the school playground. (S2 Ep4)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: An Egg-stremely Bad Idea: Hoping to 'brighten her day,' Izzy and Owen revamp Gwen's egg chair. (S2 Ep5)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.desc: Zombizou: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Miss Bustier, now Zombizou. (S2 Ep14)

programme.desc: Captain Hardrock: Ladybug faces Juleka's mother, now Captain Hardrock. (S2 Ep15)

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Brown, y chwilotwr lliw, yn cyrraedd Gwlad y Lliwiau. Colour explorer Brown arrives in Colourland.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Awn i oerfel gogledd Rwsia i gwrdd â'r Walrws ac i wres anialwch yr Aifft i gwrdd â'r Sgorpion. We visit icy north Russia to meet a Walrus and to the desert of Egypt to meet the Scorpion.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Guto'n benderfynol o gael gafael ar y bwmpen fwyaf sydd yng ngardd Mr Puw. When Guto sets his sights on the biggest pumpkin in Mr Puw's patch, rolling it out of the garden isn't easy!

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y môr-ladron sy'n ymuno â Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, ond nid yw o'n gwybod beth yw'r peth od sydd ar ei ben-glin - pwy all ei helpu? Today, Pablo discovers a scab on his knee and is a bit upset.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Byddwn yn dysgu am sut mae robotiaid yn gweithio. Teithiwn i wledydd pell fel Siapan, un o'r gwledydd sy'n creu nifer fawr o robotiaid. We learn how robots work and travel to Japan.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau'n paratoi syrpries i Cain! Will everything go according to plan? On today's poptastic adventure, the friends plan a secret surprise for Fly.

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Bu Newffion yn holi pobol ar y stryd pa iaith mae nhw'n siarad gyda'u cwn, ac hefyd yn holi awdur sydd wedi ysgrifennu llyfr am y pwnc. Today, we learn about a rare bird in Llanuwchllyn!

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae'n hwyl adeiladu castell tywod, ond weithiau mae'n fwy o hwyl fyth cael ei ddymchwel. Building sandcastles is fun, but sometimes it's even more fun to knock them over.

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Gyda help a straeon gan Taid, mae Stiw ac Elsi yn paratoi i wersylla yn yr ardd gefn. With a little help and stories from Taid, Stiw and Elsi prepare to go camping in Stiw's garden.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae Plwmp eisiau mynd i badlo ym mhwll yr ardd ond yn anffodus, dydy hi ddim wedi glawio ers tro ac mae'r pwll yn sych. Plwmp wants to go for a paddle in the garden pond but it has dried up!

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd y cwn bywiog heddiw? What's happening in the lively pups' world today?

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Huw sy'n beicio yn Coed y Brenin gyda Gruff, Tryfan & Elen, bydd disgyblion Ysgol Penmachno yn plannu coed a Meleri sy'n ymuno a chriw o gasglwyr sbwriel Caerdydd. Planting trees & more.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cân fywiog am bum hwyaden i helpu plant bach i gyfri. A lively song about five ducks to help little ones to count.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae cefnder Twm Twrch o Awstralia wedi cyrraedd ac yn barod i fynd ar antur fawr. Twm Twrch's cousin from Australia, Cynog Cyhyrog, has arrived and is ready to go on a dangerous adventure.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Pan nad oes unrhyw ffordd o goginio selsig, mae'r Chef Cef yn dod i'r adwy! When there's no way of cooking sausages it's Chef Cef come to the rescue!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Crawc yn penderfynu marchogaeth ei geffyl am y tro cyntaf gan nad yw ei gar na'i garafán yn gweithio. Crawc decides to ride his horse as car and caravan are out of action.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth, wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc !

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Odo is a brand new animated series for preschool kids all over the world. Comedy driven stories about a little owl who believes in himself.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Byddwn yn teithio yn ôl mewn hanes i ddarganfod mwy am ddyfais glyfar iawn, y cwmpawd, a sut oedd y cwmpawd yn helpu pobl. We'll travel back in history to discover more about compasses.

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Mae pobol yn mwynhau casglu pob mathau o bethau, ond moch sy'n diddori Gwawr. People enjoy collecting all kinds of things. Today we meet Gwawr, who collects pigs.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Digbi'n gadael pâr o adenydd i hedfan o dy Betsi ar ddamwain. Digbi accidentally lets out a pair of Betsi's wings and decides to get them back before she finds out.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Pwy oedd y person cyntaf ar y lleuad? Cyfle euraidd i Tad-cu ddweud wrtho mai ei fam-gu a'i ffrind Beti oedd y bobl yna! Hari's question today is: who was the first person on the moon?

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae radio'r Harbwr Feistr wedi torri ac yn anffodus, ni all gysgu heb wrando ar swn cerddoriaeth. The Harbour Master's radio has broken and he can't sleep without listening to music.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nôl gyda chymeriadau newydd fel Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Popeth, Dani Rheolaeth, a'r hen ffefrynnau: Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa a Delyth Dylwythen. Cacamwnci is back!

programme.title: New: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn gweld y lleuad yn diflannu'n sydyn ac yn meddwl bod rhywbeth yn ei fwyta! The Woohoos see the moon apparently disappearing and think something is eating it!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae cawl newydd Siôn mor boblogaidd, mae'n rhedeg yn fyr o gynhwysion. Mae Izzy'n achub y dydd gydag awgrym blasus iawn. Izzy improvises when Siôn's new soup proves so popular it runs out!

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Jams, Mandy a Norman gyda'i gilydd ar Arwr y Mynydd gyda Moose. Today, Jams, Mandy and Norman are together on the Mountain Hero with Moose.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae'r Octonots yn brwydro drwy gors i achub fflamingo bach cyn iddo gael ei ddal gan ysglyfaethwyr llwglyd! The Octonauts wade through a swamp to find a lost flamingo chick.

programme.title: New: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Harri gets a call from Lisa and her father - their welding machine has broken and Harri goes to help. Mae Harri'n cael galwad gan Lisa a'i thad gan fod y peiriant weldio wedi torri.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'r Cymylaubychain mewn hwyliau creadigol iawn heddiw, pawb heblaw am Baba Glas. All the Cymylaubychain are in a creative mood apart from Baba Glas who doesn't know what to do.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae pob math o bethau anghyffredin yn cael eu dwyn ar hyd a lled Pen Cyll. Unusual items are being taken from all over Applecross. Digby decides to track down the mysterious taker.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod gwlyb a gwyntog ar Fferm y Waun ac mae Pwsi Meri Mew yn ceisio cadw'n sych - ond mae'r gwynt yn cipio ei hymbarél! It's a wet, windy day at Fferm y Waun for Pwsi Meri Mew!

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae'r Abadas yn edrych ymlaen at chwarae gêm y geiriau. 'Berfa' yw'r gair newydd heddiw. The Abadas are looking forward to playing the word game. Today's word is 'wheelbarrow'.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Croeso i'r Arctig. Gwisgwch yn gynnes! Mae'r Tralalas yn gweld yr anifeiliaid anhygoel sy'n byw yno. Welcome to the Arctic where the Tralalas see lots of amazing animals that live there.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Ar ddiwrnod pen-blwydd Maer Oci mae Blero'n methu credu bod morgrugyn wedi dwyn y gacen ben-blwydd! It's the day of Mayor Oci's birthday picnic and an ant sneaks away with the cake!

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen! Welcome to a new series of Jamborî!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Joni wrth ei fodd â'i rôl fel arwr. Ond rhaid cofio beth mae'n olygu i fod yn arwr er mwyn llwyddo. Joni loves his role as a hero but must remember what it means to be a hero to succeed.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Glan Morfa sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Glan Morfa join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Tib, Lalw a Bobl yn ymweld â Hen Gloc y Goedwig - y peth hynaf yn y goedwig, nd mae wedi stopio... Tib, Lalloo and Bobble visit the Old Forest Clock - the oldest thing in the forest!

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Ar ôl ymweliad at y barbwr, mae Lewis eisiau gwybod 'Pam bod fy ngwallt yn tyfu?'. After a visit to the barber's, Lewis wants to know why his hair grows? Tadcu has an answer.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Harri gets a call to the Loggerheads park. He and Aled fix the bug hotel making sure the caterpillar has a safe home. Mae Harri'n cael galwad i barc Loggerheads i drwsio gwesty'r pryfed.

programme.desc: Dechrau'r cystadlu ynghyd a'r holl newyddion a gwybodaeth angenrheidiol ar ail fore'r Wyl. The start of the competitions plus news and information on the second morning of the Eisteddfod.

programme.title: Cinebox Memories

programme.title: Medway Queen

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
